hr.p: The National Center is excited to announce the launch of a brand new safety app! Our app, Safety Central, is ideal for parents, law enforcement, or anyone who is looking to stay up-to-date on the latest news, media, and safety tips from NCMES.
Designed as a digital child ID kit that lets parents keep their children's information right at their fingertips, this might be the most important app you eve download.

DIGITAL CHILD ID KIT
This feature allows parents and guardians to save potentially lifesaving information about their child, including photos and digital fingerprint images that could be used in case of an emergency. The app will remind you when it's time to update your child's picture so you are always ready with an up-to-date photo.

SEARCH MISSING CHILDREN
This feature allows users to filter current missing children posters by state, making this information more widely available and easier to access than ever.

GET THE PATEST NCMEC UPDATES
Receive a special welcome message from John Walsh and stay up-to-date with the latest news, trends, safety tips and media from MissingKids.org, NetSmartz, and KidSmartz!
Thanks to generous contributions from our friends at EMCOR, Safety Central is FREE to download and use on both Apple and Android devices!

p.br: Download it from the app store today!

a.title: Go to comments for Saftety Central

div.span: We have received several requests from parents about the Parent Portal. Below are two documents that should help answer any questions. The first is a form to request access to your child's records through SchoolTools. The second is step-by-step directions for using the SchoolTool Parent Portal. You will find a link to the Parent Portal at the top of every webpage on our school's website.

a.span: Download the Parent Portal Request Form
Download the Parent Portal User Guide

a.title: Go to comments for Parent Portal Information
